name: Cavernous Pink
description:
Control the forces of a very moist space biome with the power of your two trusty feet and the unwitting aid of the hostile natives.

Use F to move left, J to move right. Combine the two to jump or smash.


Music is Strawberry Boogie by chēēZπ

Strawberry Boogie has been modified to be shorter for a smaller file size, I recommend listening to the original if you like it.
